title: Bound Heat: Stolen Souls
overview: An insane homicidal woman escapes from a mental institution and joins a mobster specializing in the importation of women from Europe to America. With her arrival the operation grows and even her mobster boss falls prey to her evil ways and Fury. Nothing stops her from seducing the willing into becoming her Chained Lesbian Slaves fulfilling her erotic Desire to become their dominant mistress.
